      • getObjectiveVo

        public java.util.List<ObjectiveVo> getObjectiveVo(java.util.List<OBJCType> objectiveDataLineList,
                                                  java.lang.Long stageLogId)
                                           throws GrcException
        This function will be used to transform the input data to form GRCF understands.
        Parameters:
        objectiveDataLineList - A generic list of type CreateDataLineType containing Objective data lines from input message.
        stageLogId - Variable of type Long containing the auto-generated id of the stage in which the process currently is. This id is same as the primary key of table MS_GRC_CIF_API_STAGE_LOG.
        Returns:
        A list of Objective object transformed in form understandable by GRCF.
        Throws:
        GrcException - Throws GrcException in case of any error with appropriate
